Prev:Main Up:Index Next:Target

1-Main Panel Buttons
1-2 Quickly deal with players' idiocy.
ChatBan: can take a player name and duration from QB, or just duration for target's chat inability ban.
ChatUnBan: target or player name are freed from the chan inability ban.
Jail: Works like Chat Ban for parameters, but puts a character in prison. If no duration specified, penalty last forever.
UnJail: Take players out of prison, they appear in Floran Village. Offline players are affected too.
Kick: disconnect player from server.
Ban: Given a character name in the QB, its entire account gets banned.
UnBan: Given a player name, its account gets unbanned.
Find: Show a list of character names matching whatever you specified, or a list/find dialog if none.
Repair: some values for the character name you provided will be switched back to safe defaults. Use it wisely!
